# The `VPBuilder` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

VPlan-based builder utility analogous to <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder</a>. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

VPlan-based builder utility analogous to <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder</a>.
